titleStmt.title: Spiritual discoveries to the overthrow of popery root and branch. Shewing that I. The steeplehouse is no church ... / By a waiter in Israel, and one of the New Covenanters ...
titleStmt.author: Bettris, Jeane.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Jeane Bettris by Wing.
Imperfect: tight binding with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
